title: Court ruling tightens exceptions on credit hire claims
text:
Court ruling tightens exceptions on credit hire claims
A ruling on a credit hire case brought by HF and Admiral has set out a tighter expectation on providing evidence of potential losses.
In 2019, Hussain v EUI limited credit hire claims for profit-earning vehicles, such as taxis, to loss of profit unless claimants could meet one of three exceptions.
